evidence: While high quality entity translation is essential in cross-lingual information access and trans lation , it is non-trivial to achieve , due to the challenge that entity translation , though typically bearing pronunciation similarity , can also be arbitrary , e.g. , Jackie Chan and fiX : it ( pronounced Cheng Long ) .
text: While high quality entity translation is essential in cross-lingual information access and trans lation , it is non-trivial to achieve , due to the challenge that entity translation , though typically bearing pronunciation similarity , can also be arbitrary , e.g. , Jackie Chan and fiX : it ( pronounced Cheng Long ) .
